[ C ] an evil spirit
[ C usually singular ] approving a person who does a particular activity with great skill or energy: She works like a demon. Stefan has a demon serve.
[ C ] a person who behaves very badly: humorous That's the last time I take care of her kids - I'll be glad when the little demons go home.
[ C ] a negative feeling that causes you to worry or behave badly: She had her demons and, later in life, they drove her to drink.
